    • Parser

      public Parser(String path, char delimiter, boolean csv) throws IOException
      Constructor for Parser class
      Parameters:
      path - - path to file
      delimiter - - delimiter used in CSV file
      csv - - true if file is CSV, false if file is XLSX
      Throws:
      IOException - - thrown when file is not found
